name: Go Looly
description:
Go Looly is a single player, vertical scrolling, shoot 'em up

This game was made using Palace Software's Shoot Em Up Construction Kit.

In this game the player controls a cute little angel who somehow flies over a lurid landscape that is populated with demons, robots and other gun toting baddies. The baddies shoot bullets but Looly shoots cute little hearts. Additional points are earned by collecting gems.
The game is keyboard controlled, left will move Lolly to the left as expected but it also sets the direction in which he/she fires until another direction key is pressed.

shot.caption: This is displayed as the game loads
A little after the start of level one, showing the numerous baddies Lolly faces
